title: Team Recruitment Discord Server!
body:
Hey there everyone! I have put together a Discord server for everyone to use to help find new members for teams, duo/flex, and scrims.

This server is for everyone, from any server, and has region specific chat for each of the following regions.
**- EUNE
- EUW
- NA
- OCE**

Let me know how you think of this, and invite friends! let's make this a big community to help people create teams!

https://discord.gg/eP2WRKe

replies.body: Rocket league has this, quite useful.

It is, and I looked around for any other discord server for league, and couldn't find one...
I decided to make it myself xD
